mapper.select: select count(1) count_num from rh_report rr left join rh_datasource rd on rr.ds_id=rd.id left join rh_user ru on rr.update_user=ru.id where rr.`status`=1

select * from ( select id , null uid , pid , name ,status , sequence , 'category' type from rh_report_category rrc where rrc.status=0 union all select id , uid , category_id pid , name, status , sequence , 'report' type from rh_report rr where rr.status=1 ) t order by type , pid , sequence , id
